category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_occ_default_qty_prevent_from_blank
preference.preference_description: Set the BOM Line quantity field (bl_quantity) to 1 when saving a new part or leave it empty. Possible values: - TRUE: By default, the BOMLine's bl_quantity property is set to 1. - FALSE: The native Teamcenter behaviour is applied.
